trans-unit.source: Represents a callout annotation.
trans-unit.target: 설명선 주석을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 설명선 주석은 주석 위치와 앵커 지점 간 연결을 그릴 수 있는 유일한 주석이입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스도 텍스트를 표시할 수 있으며 필요한 크기가 자동으로 계산 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Different callout styles are supported.
trans-unit.target: 지원 되는 다른 설명선 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation position alignment to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 앵커 지점에 주석 위치 맞춤을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> 앵커 지점에 대 한 주석의 맞춤을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 앵커 지점에서 주석 X 위치의 있는 오프셋을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>중 하나는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A>속성 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> 속성을 설정 해야</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorX%2A> 하는 또는</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> 사용 하 여 고정 되어야 합니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 앵커 지점에서 주석 X 위치의 오프셋을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the Y-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 앵커 지점에서 주석 Y 위치의 있는 오프셋을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>중 하나는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A>속성 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> 속성을 설정 해야</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorY%2A> 하는 또는</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> 사용 하 여 고정 되어야 합니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the annotation's Y-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 앵커 지점에서 주석 Y 위치의 오프셋을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation type name.
trans-unit.target: 주석 유형 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 내부 에서만 사용 해야 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 내부 에서만 사용 해야 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 주석 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 배경색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value used for the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 주석 배경에 사용 되는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 주석 배경 그라데이션 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, and are set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지 색 그라데이션을 그리는 데 및로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> 주석 배경을 그리는 데 사용 되는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 배경 해치 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, and are set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지 색은 줄무늬를 그리는 데 사용 하 고로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> 주석 배경을 그리는 데 사용 되는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 주석 배경 보조 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This color is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 와이 색은 사용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>속성 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>속성이 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value used in conjunction with a primary color to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 해칭 또는 그라데이션 채우기가 있는 주석을 배경을 그리는 기본 색과 함께 사용 하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: 설명선 선 앵커 단면 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CalloutAnchorCap property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: CalloutAnchorCap 속성 주석 앵커 포인트와 연결 되는 줄에 대 한 앵커 단면 스타일을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> callout style is used.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은만 적용 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>설명선 스타일이 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref> 설명선 선 앵커 단면에 사용할 스타일을 나타내는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation callout style.
trans-unit.target: 주석 설명선 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line color.
trans-unit.target: 주석 선 색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 주석 선을 그리는 데 사용 되는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line style.
trans-unit.target: 주석 선 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> 주석 선을 그리는 데 사용 되는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 주석의 선 두께 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the annotation line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> 주석 줄 너비를 픽셀 단위로 나타내는 값입니다.
